    import {iVXioRules} from 'ivx-js/modules/data/ivx-io/rules.js'
    public class | source

    iVXioRules

    Generates an iVXio Rules function that allows navigation and rule evaluation based on both experience data and progress.

    Constructor Summary

    Public Constructor
    public

    constructor(experience: iVXioExperiece)

    Attaches the current experience to this class to help process both data and progress informaiton.

    Member Summary

    Public Members
    public

    experience: iVXioExperience

    Puts the current exprience object into this class for rule evaluation.
    public get

    expressionMap: object

    iVXio's expressions use the symbols for evaluation, so this maps to the keywords for comparing.
    public get

    rules: Function

    A function that returns a stateId when an object in its navArray evaluates to true.

    Method Summary

    Public Methods
    public

    evaluateRule(navObj: Object): Boolean

    Evaluates a rule to be true or false depending on the experience's current data and progress. Used to choose which state to navigate to next.
    public

    getProgressValue(progress: string): number

    Converts the progress name to a numeric value using this expererience's progressMap so the processRules function can evaluate this navigation based on its value.
    public

    processRules(-: array): string

    Iterates through an array of rules and stateIds and returns the first stateId to navigate to next based on this evaluateRule function.

    Public Constructors

    public constructor(experience: iVXioExperiece) source

    Attaches the current experience to this class to help process both data and progress informaiton.

    Params:

    NameTypeAttributeDescription
    experience iVXioExperiece

    iVXio Experience object containing all the information for these rules to evaluate on.

    Public Members

    public experience: iVXioExperience source

    Puts the current exprience object into this class for rule evaluation.

    public get expressionMap: object source

    iVXio's expressions use the symbols for evaluation, so this maps to the keywords for comparing.

    public get rules: Function source

    A function that returns a stateId when an object in its navArray evaluates to true.

    Public Methods

    public evaluateRule(navObj: Object): Boolean source

    Evaluates a rule to be true or false depending on the experience's current data and progress. Used to choose which state to navigate to next.

    Params:

    NameTypeAttributeDescription
    navObj Object

    an object containing at least a state ID and an optional rule to be evaluated.

    Return:

    Boolean

    a true/false value determining if the rule evaluates to true or false. If a rule doesn't exist, this will return true implying that the state is a default.

    public getProgressValue(progress: string): number source

    Converts the progress name to a numeric value using this expererience's progressMap so the processRules function can evaluate this navigation based on its value.

    Params:

    NameTypeAttributeDescription
    progress string

    Key to a progress value in this experiences progress map.

    Return:

    number

    the value of the progress in the progress map.

    public processRules(-: array): string source

    Iterates through an array of rules and stateIds and returns the first stateId to navigate to next based on this evaluateRule function.

    Params:

    NameTypeAttributeDescription
    - array

    navArray - An array of expressions and states that will evaluate the correct navigation to go to next.

    Return:

    string

    state id to navigate next to.
    Generated by ESDoc(0.4.7)
